subtitle.Text: So, Christmas Duck. Christmas Duck is a fan favorite.
He's kind of a mascot, I guess, and I think that's partly 'cause it's a weird concept, a Christmas Duck, and partly because it's the first unique thing you that encounter in the game.
It kind of personifies, a little character. But the thing is, Christmas Duck was not planned.

When we were starting the project we didn't have a 3D modeler, because Kate came on a couple of months after we started, and we needed a bunch of 3D models, so I was going through the Unity Asset Store.
I was going through the list, and I saw this "Christmas Duck". And I was like "What is this...? OK."
And I grabbed it and we used it as a test object to set up the system where you can grab stuff and carry it around.
And then I ended up saying "All right, we've got this Christmas Duck, I'll hide the key under it."
And instead of replacing the free model with a totally different thing, we just made a real version of it.
Karla modeled it and Kate textured it, and we kept it in the game.
And we're glad, 'cause he's everybody's little friend. Good ol' Christmas Duck.
